       }, {

           "basic": true,
           "position_V": 4,

           "regex_description" : ""
       },{

           "status": "Active",

       }, {

           "field_max_length": 100,
           "field_min_length": 1,

           "field_type": "text",
           "status": "Active",
           "basic": true,
           "position_V": 6,
           "position_H": 1,
           "regex_description" : ""
       }, {

           "field_name": "advertisement",
           "field_type": "checkbox",
           "field_required": false,
           "status": "Active",
           "basic": true,
           "position_V": 7,
           "position_H": 1,
           "regex_description" : ""
       }, {
           "field_label": "Terms & Conditions",
           "field_name": "termsAndConditionsRewardsUSA",
           "field_type_name": "termsAndConditions",
           "field_type": "checkbox",
           "subplatform": "MyCooler",
           "platform": "Rewards_USA",
           "field_required": true,
           "status": "Active",
           "basic": true,
           "position_V": 8,
           "position_H": 1,
           "regex_description" : ""
       }, {
           "field_label": "Email Newsletter Notifications",
           "field_name": "email_opt_in",
           "field_type": "checkbox",
           "field_required": true,
           "status": "Active",
           "basic": true,
           "position_V": 9,
           "position_H": 1,
           "regex_description" : ""
       }, {
           "field_label": "Push Notifications",
           "field_name": "push_opt_in",
           "field_type": "checkbox",
           "field_required": true,
           "status": "Active",
           "basic": true,
           "position_V": 10,
           "position_H": 1,
           "regex_description" : ""
       }, {
           "field_label": "SMS Notifications",
           "field_name": "sms_opt_in",
           "field_type": "checkbox",
           "field_required": true,
           "status": "Active",
           "basic": true,
           "position_V": 11,
           "position_H": 1,
           "regex_description" : ""
       }
   ],
   "create_user": "yohisgil@gmail.com"
}
